Tuesday(3) === 04/08/2025
<script> Yesterday(2) onStart START 
Numerology, Date, Task === NAN
console.log(2)
</script>

<script>Today(3) onUpdate UPDATE
Numerology, Date
Task = (3)
onEOD === EOD + Task.onUpdate
console.log(3)
</script>

<script>Tomorrow(4) onStop STOP
Numerology, Date
Task = (4)
console.log(4)
</script>
